description: ‚úÖ LIGHTWEIGHT AND BREATHABLE - JJ Care's Silicone Scar Sheets are general-purpose adhesive tapes mostly used in scar treatment and overall wound care. This type of medical tape is most often used in scar treatment as well as wound aftercare. It is recommended for use on healing C-section scars. The silicone patches for scars are a great way to promote collagen production to help improve old and new scars. ‚úÖ MEDICAL AND PRACTICAL USE - JJ Care's Silicone Scar Sheets are handy to have around the house. Moms will find a roll or two handy in flattening and reducing scar formation from cuts, scrapes and wounds. After use, just rinse, air-dry and reuse to help you save up on medical costs.
